title: Mmesoma Ejiofor

Department of Economics
Memorial University of Newfoundland

title: Mmesoma Ejiofor
text:
About
I am a graduate student of Economics at Memorial University of Newfoundland. I currently work as a graduate assistant at the department of Economics, Memorial University of Newfoundland and a research assistant to Dr. Nikita Lyssenko, a professor at department of economics, Memorial University of Newfoundland. I am passionate about exploring economic relationships and financial analysis. Prior to pursuing to Master’s studies in Economics, I have stints of experience in banking and consulting. My research interest lies generally in the field of development and financial economics.
